author: Linda Givetash and Winston Wilde and Kurt Chirbas and Hernan Muñoz Ratto and Vivienne Wu
title: Amid protests, Trump says some governors 'have gone too far' on lockdown measures
description: As the coronavirus death toll tops 40,000 in the United States, protesters are demanding lockdowns be lifted while in Europe, some schools are re-opening.
content:
As the coronavirus death toll tops 40,000 in the United States, President Donald Trump said some governors were taking lockdown restrictions too far and expressed support for protesters demanding a return to work.
Trump's criticism of states' handling of the… [+4245 chars]
